title: Tell me about a memorable experience you had at a bar.

korean: 작년에 친구 생일 파티를 바에서 한 게 기억나.
친구가 좋아하는 스타일의 바를 미리 예약했어.
친구들 다섯 명이 모였는데, 다들 오랜만에 만나서 반가웠어.
생일 케이크도 미리 준비해서 깜짝 이벤트를 했어.
다 같이 칵테일 여러 잔 시켜서 나눠 마셨어.
바텐더가 친절하게 칵테일에 대해 설명해 줬어.
음악도 좋고 분위기도 너무 좋아서 시간 가는 줄 몰랐어.
정말 즐거운 밤이었고, 또 이런 모임 갖고 싶어.
english: I remember having a friend's birthday party at a bar last year.
I reserved a bar in the style my friend likes in advance.
It was a rooftop bar, and the night view was really amazing.
Five friends gathered, and we were all happy to meet after a long time.
We also prepared a birthday cake in advance and did a surprise event.
My friend was really surprised and happy.
We all ordered several cocktails and shared them.
The bartender kindly explained about the cocktails.
The music was good and the atmosphere was so nice that we didn't realize time passing.
We stayed until past midnight and then went home.
It was a really fun night, and I want to have another gathering like this.
